text:
Oh my goodness! Is this really okay? It really surprised me so much that I read the email 3 times!
Thanks to the internetworking let me know 2 predecessors, I never dreamed that the founder of Koaloha would make a ukulele for me, I was really moved! This pineapple ğŸ Very three-dimensional and very special! I've never played a ukulele like this before, which is really cool!
In addition, most of my students can not communicate in English, because they are still young, learning English is too short, but just because of the English songs, we will study for a period of time. Other times, we play more Chinese songs, and even play some Chinese songs on the ukulele (attached video, because of the limitation of email space, I can only upload a short paragraph, please forgive me).
But I really appreciate your suggestion of the video meeting culture course and seminar. You guys are really thoughtful and leave a strong mark in the history of the development of ukulele!
I can only say thank you again to express my feelings, if I have a chance to go to the United States, I must pay a good visit to you!
